noUselessTypeConstraint.description:
Description

Disallow usinganyorunknownas type constraint.
Generic type parameters (<T>) in TypeScript may beconstrainedwithextends.
A supplied type must then be a subtype of the supplied constraint.
All types are subtypes ofanyandunknown.
It is thus useless to extend fromanyorunknown.
noUselessTypeConstraint.option: This rule has no specific options.
